block.name: search_sobjects_soql_v2
block.description: Search for records using SOQL query in Salesforce

input.query:
SELECT Id,
  Amendment_Type__c,
  Order_Source__c,
  Type,
  Operating_Unit__c,
  Country_Of_Order__c,
  OrderNumber,
  Opportunity_Number__c,
  PoNumber,
  Bill_to_Account__c,
  Bill_To_Contact_First_Name__c,
  Bill_To_Contact_Email__c,
  Bill_To_Account_Name__c,
  Bill_To_Contact_Last_Name__c,
  BillingStreet,
  BillingCity,
  BillingStateCode,
  BillingCountryCode,
  BillingPostalCode,
  Exchange_Rate__c,
  OriginalOrderReferenceNumber__c,
  Entitled_To_Contact_Email__c,
  Entitled_To_Contact_First_Name__c,
  Entitled_To_Contact_Last_Name__c,
  ShippingStreet,
  ShippingCity,
  ShippingStateCode,
  ShippingCountryCode,
  ShippingPostalCode,
  TotalAmount,
  Pay_Now__c,
  Web_Login__c,
  End_Customer_PO_Number__c,
  Alfresco_Approval_Id__c,
  Order_Correct_Reason__c,
  Route_To_Market__c,
  PoDate,
  EffectiveDate,
  CurrencyIsoCode,
  Employee_Number__c,
  Channel_Program_Level__c,
  Channel_Program__c,
  Ship_To_Account__c,
  Reseller_PO_Number__c,
  Ship_To_Address__Street__s,
  Ship_To_Address__City__s,
  Ship_To_Address__StateCode__s,
  Ship_To_Address__CountryCode__s,
  Ship_To_Address__PostalCode__s,
  Ship_To_Contact_Email__c,
  Ship_To_Contact_First_Name__c,
  Ship_To_Contact_Last_Name__c,
  Sold_To_Account_Name__c,
  Sold_To_Address__Street__s,
  Sold_To_Address__City__s,
  Sold_To_Address__StateCode__s,
  Sold_To_Address__CountryCode__s,
  Sold_To_Address__PostalCode__s,
  Sold_To_Contact_Email__c,
  Sold_To_Contact_First_Name__c,
  Sold_To_Contact_Last_Name__c,
  Distributor__r.Name,
  Distributor__r.Source_Record_Id__c,
  Partner_Channel_Program_Level__c,
  Partner_Channel_Program__c,
  Partner__r.Name,
  Partner__r.Source_Record_Id__c,
  Distributor_Role__c,
  Partner_Role__c,
  Booking_Currency__c,
  (SELECT 
    Quantity,
    UnitPrice,
    ListPrice,
    TotalPrice,
    ServiceDate,
    EndDate,
    OrderItemNumber,
    Line_Number__c,
    Product_Code__c,
    SBQQ__ContractAction__c,
    Customer_Unit_Price__c,
    Line_Item_One_Time_Discount__c,
    Total_Line_Discount_Amount__c,
    Unit_Of_Measure__c,
    Web_Login__c
  FROM OrderItems Order By Line_Number__c, OrderItemNumber )
FROM Order WHERE Id = '#{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"salesforce","line":"e31da0e9","path":["Record_Id__c"]}')}'

input.query: OriginalOrderReferenceNumber__c  = '#{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_variable","line":"be2d0d17","path":["mostRecentOrderReferenceNumber"]}')}' AND OrderReferenceNumber <> NULL AND Amendment_Type__c = 'Rebook' AND IsDeleted=false

extended_input_schema.hint:
You can explicitly publish message to the specific topic partition
                    (index starts from 0). Otherwise Kafka will select partition automatically.
extended_input_schema.label: Partition
extended_input_schema.name: partition

extended_input_schema.hint:
Message key, to be stored with the message.
                     A key can be used by Kafka for selecting an appropriate topic partition
                     (when partition is not assigned explicitly).
extended_input_schema.label: Key
extended_input_schema.name: key

extended_input_schema.hint:
A list of key-value pairs, to be stored with the message.
                 Headers' keys may be duplicated.
extended_input_schema.label: Message headers
extended_input_schema.name: headers
